summary: Adds banners along roads showing which hold you are about to enter.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66315/?][b][size=4][img]https://s31.postimg.org/46phh9erv/spanish_flag_small.png[/img]Traducción al español[/size][/b][/url] 
[size=4][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75750/?] [img]https://s31.postimg.org/m658iniuz/italian_flag_small.png[/img]Traduzione italiana[/url][/b][/size]
[b][size=3][url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/graphisme/environnement/bannieres_aux_frontieres][img]https://s31.postimg.org/8y944mvgr/french_flag_small.png[/img]Traduction française[/url][/size][/b]

This mod adds banners along roadsides at the boundaries of two holds. The banner you see will show you which hold you are entering. If you're not sure what the banner represents, just walk up to it and it will show the name of the hold.

County and state boundaries are marked in real life, so why not Skyrim?

The borders were placed using the original Skyrim map that shipped with the game. If you are using Warburg's Paper 3D Map (2nd Texture), the borders should match.

Mod cleaned with TES5Edit ver 3.0.30


[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

[u]Compatibility[/u]
Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916/?]'Lanterns of Skyrim.'[/url]
Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33393/?]'Point The Way.'[/url]
Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38529/?]'Touring Carriages.'[/url]

[u]Assets Used[/u]
This mod contains a re-texture of the Markarth city banner created by Sydzilla to replace the place-holder texture in the vanilla game. Sydzilla's original mod can be found here...

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18732//?



**Check out Immersive [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62735/?]Immersive Hold Borders.[/url]   (Compatible with HBB)**



[youtube]xht5lvL28Do[/youtube] [youtube]Ul7waUXBn90[/youtube] [youtube]UXfyck_vKQI[/youtube]
